#summary Documentation of our build process.

= Introduction =

The build-process of iDocIt! should be automated to achieve the following goals:

# Save time and ensure consistency when releasing a new version of iDocIt!
# Use the latest development state in projects to collect first experiences with our new features.
# Identify bugs and side effects through automated tests very early after their implementation.
